description.value:
Thick briars have grown through the skeleton's bones, covering it in red roses with inch-long thorns.

The skeleton's unarmed melee Strikes deal additional piercing damage equal to 1/3 the skeleton's level (minimum 1 damage).

At the end of each of its turns, if the skeleton has caused piercing damage with its thorns, it regains [[/r (max(1,@actor.level))[healing]]]{HP equal to its level} (minimum 1). Each time the skeleton regains HP in this way, another rose blossoms.
